messages.content: You are the SME (Subject Matter Expert) in CS (Customer Support). Please answer the questions accurately. If the question is in English, write your answer in English.
What is the address and location details of the Sokcho Center?
The Sokcho Center is located at 강원 속초시 조양동 1500-1번지 삼성스토어 속초 3층. The road name address is 강원 속초시 동해대로 4141 삼성스토어 속초 3층. It is situated 540 meters to the right from 청초교(쌍다리)사거리 towards 부영아파트.
What are the operating hours and repairable items at the Sokcho Center?

The operating hours are Monday from 09:00 to 18:00, Tuesday to Friday from 12:00 to 15:00, and Saturday from 09:00 to 13:00. The center can repair items such as smartphones, tablets, wearable devices, PCs, monitors, printers, audio equipment, TVs, DVDs, camcorders, ovens/microwaves, portable induction cooktops, and other small appliances.
What are the parking and public transportation options for visiting the Sokcho Center?

There is parking available on the 1st floor of the building with an estimated capacity of 26 vehicles, and it is free for visitors. Due to limited parking space, it is recommended to use public transportation. Free parking is also available in the parking lines in front of the road. The center can be accessed by taxi, with the nearest landmark being the road in front of 부영5단지.
You are the SME (Subject Matter Expert) in CS (Customer Support). Please answer the questions accurately. If the question is in English, write your answer in English.
What is the address and location details of the 제천센터?

The 제천센터 is located at 충북 제천시 장락동 319-4번지 삼성스토어 제천 1층. The road name address is 충북 제천시 내토로 783 삼성스토어 제천 1층. It is situated 300m straight ahead on the right from 장락 삼거리 towards the city direction, before reaching 장락동 엘크루즈힐즈 아파트.
What are the operating hours and repairable items at the 제천센터?

The operating hours are Monday and Friday from 09:00 to 15:00, Tuesday to Thursday from 10:00 to 14:00, and Saturday from 09:00 to 12:00. The center can repair items such as smartphones, tablets, wearable devices, laptops, PCs, monitors, printers, TVs, home theaters, audio equipment, DVDs, cameras, camcorders, ovens/microwaves, and other small appliances.
How can one reach the 제천센터 from different directions and what parking facilities are available?

From 장낙삼거리, move 1.5 km to 청전사거리, turn left, U-turn in front of the health center, and move 20m to find it on the right. From 화소동 롯데마트, move 2 km to 청전사거리, turn right, U-turn in front of the health center, and move 20m to find it on the right. From 제천역, move 2.5-3 km towards 청전교차로 and the health center, and find it on the right. From 의림지, move straight towards 역전, U-turn in front of the health center, and move 20m to find it on the right. There are 47 free parking spaces available behind the building.

What is the address and location details of the 성서센터?
The 성서센터 is located at 대구 달서구 이곡동 1258-9번지 삼성스토어 성서 3층. The road address is 대구 달서구 달구벌대로 1351 삼성스토어 성서 3층. It is situated near the 성서초등학교, next to the 1st exit of 이곡역 on 대구지하철 2호선.
What are the operating hours and repairable items at the 성서센터?

The 성서센터 operates from Monday to Friday between 11:00 and 16:00, and on Saturday from 09:00 to 13:00. The center can repair items such as smartphones, tablets, wearable devices, PCs, monitors, printers, TVs, home theaters, audio equipment, DVDs, cameras, camcorders, ovens/microwaves, portable induction cooktops, and other small appliances.
What are the directions and parking details for reaching the 성서센터?

From 성서IC, drive straight for 600 meters towards 성주 and find the center at 디지털프라자 3층 near the 1st exit of 이곡역. From 대구은행사거리, head towards 성서IC for about 1 km. From 장동네거리, drive 1.6 km towards 이곡역 and find the center on the left. From 성서고등학교, head towards 평화타운 사거리 and find the center near the 1st exit of 이곡역. Parking is available in front and behind the building.
You are the SME (Subject Matter Expert) in CS (Customer Support). Please answer the questions accurately. If the question is in English, write your answer in English.
What is the name and category of the service center mentioned in the text?
The name of the service center is 시화휴대폰센터, and it falls under the category of 모바일.
What are the address details and basic map directions for 시화휴대폰센터?

The address is 경기 시흥시 정왕동 1622-5번지 삼성스토어 시화 3층, with the road name address being 경기 시흥시 평안상가4길 17 삼성스토어 시화 3층. The basic map direction is that it is located 250 meters to the right from 정황1교사거리 towards 수자원공사앞사거리, on the 2nd floor of 삼성스토어.
What are the operating hours and repairable items at 시화휴대폰센터?
The operating hours are Monday and Friday from 09:00 to 11:00, Tuesday to Thursday from 12:00 to 14:00, and Saturday from 10:00 to 13:00. The repairable items include 스마트폰, 태블릿, and 웨어러블기기.
You are the SME (Subject Matter Expert) in CS (Customer Support). Please answer the questions accurately. If the question is in English, write your answer in English.
What are the address details and basic location information for the 동대전센터?

The address of 동대전센터 is 대전 대덕구 송촌동 295-12번지 삼성스토어 동대전 2층, and the road name address is 대전 대덕구 동서대로 1751 삼성스토어 동대전 2층. It is located 150 meters from 동부사거리 towards 대전IC on the left side in the 삼성스토어 2층.
What are the work hours and special notices for the 동대전센터?

The work hours for 동대전센터 are Monday to Friday from 09:00 to 11:00 and 17:00 to 18:00, with a lunch break from 12:00 to 14:00, and Saturday from 09:00 to 11:00. Special notices include that from February to April 2024, screen protector film attachment services are unavailable on Saturdays due to internal reasons, and on March 30th, 2024, all product repairs will be delayed due to minimal staffing.
What are the repairable and non-repairable items at the 동대전센터?

The repairable items at 동대전센터 include smartphones, tablets, wearable devices, laptops, PCs, monitors, printers, TVs, home theaters, audio equipment, DVDs, cameras, camcorders, ovens/microwaves, portable induction cooktops, and other small appliances. Non-repairable items include PC internal memory, CCTV, and external (single) HDD/SSD/ODD products.

What is the address and location details of the 평택센터?

The 평택센터 is located at 경기 평택시 세교동 406-25번지 삼성스토어 평택세교 2층. The road name address is 경기 평택시 평택로 305 삼성스토어 평택세교 2층. It is situated 850 meters straight from 지제역(1번 출구) towards 평택역, past the W웨딩홀, on the 2nd floor of the 삼성스토어 building.
What are the working hours and special instructions for visiting the 평택센터?

The 평택센터 operates from 09:00 to 14:00 on Mondays and Fridays, from 09:00 to 16:00 on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays, and from 09:00 to 12:00 on Saturdays. Visitors are advised to arrive at least one hour before closing time to allow for product inspection. Note that on March 23rd (Saturday), there will be minimal staff due to internal reasons, which may delay IT and home appliance repairs.
What are the repairable and non-repairable items at the 평택센터?

The 평택센터 can repair items such as smartphones, tablets, wearable devices, laptops, PCs, monitors, printers, TVs, home theaters, audio systems, DVDs, ovens/microwaves, and other small appliances. However, they do not repair cameras, camcorders, PC internal memory, induction cooktops, CCTV, and external (single) HDD/SSD/ODD.

What is the name and category of the center mentioned in the text?
The name of the center is 진해휴대폰센터 and it falls under the category of 모바일.
What is the address and road name address of 진해휴대폰센터?
The address is 경남 창원시 진해구 자은동 851번지 삼성스토어 진해 3층, and the road name address is 경남 창원시 진해구 진해대로 915 삼성스토어 진해 3층.
How can you reach 진해휴대폰센터 from 창원 공단로 방면?

From 창원 공단로 방면, go straight towards 안민터널 direction from 성주사역, pass through 안민터널, turn left towards 구청 at the tunnel exit, go straight at 석동사거리, and then turn left at 자은사거리 to find the 디지털프라자 building on the 3rd floor.

What is the address and location details of the 중대전센터?

The 중대전센터 is located at 대전 중구 오류동 168-7번지 삼성스토어 중대전 3층. The road name address is 대전 중구 계백로 1679 삼성스토어 중대전 3층. It is situated 550 meters from 서대전네거리역 3번 출구 towards 서대전역 on the right side in the 삼성스토어 3층.
What are the operating hours and special notes for visiting the 중대전센터?

The operating hours are Monday and Friday from 09:00 to 11:00, Tuesday to Thursday from 13:00 to 15:00, and Saturday from 10:00 to 13:00. Visitors are advised to arrive at least one hour before closing time for product inspection. Note that from February to April 2024, the screen protector attachment service will not be available on Saturdays due to internal reasons.
What are the repairable and non-repairable items at the 중대전센터?

The center can repair smartphones, tablets, wearable devices, laptops, PCs, monitors, printers, TVs, home theaters, DVDs, audio equipment, cameras, ovens/microwaves, and other small appliances. However, it cannot repair PC internal memory, CCTV, induction cooktops, camcorders, and external (single) HDD/SSD/ODD.

What is the address of 강변테크노휴대폰센터?
The address of 강변테크노휴대폰센터 is 서울 광진구 구의동 546-4 테크노마트6층 사무동 D04호. The road name address is 서울 광진구 광나루로56길 85 테크노마트 6층 사무동 D04호.
What are the operating hours of 강변테크노휴대폰센터?

The operating hours are as follows: Monday and Friday from 09:00 to 11:00, Tuesday to Thursday from 12:00 to 14:00, and Saturday from 10:00 to 13:00. It is recommended to visit at least one hour before closing time for product inspection.
What items can be repaired at 강변테크노휴대폰센터 and which items cannot?

The items that can be repaired include smartphones, tablets, and wearable devices. Items that cannot be repaired include TV, home theater, audio, DVD, camcorder, oven/microwave, other small appliances, PC internal memory, external (single) HDD/SSD/ODD, laptop, PC, monitor, printer, camera, and CCTV.

What is the address and location details of the 원주센터?
The 원주센터 is located at 강원 원주시 무실동 634-1번지 삼성스토어 원주 2층. The road name address is 강원 원주시 무실밤골길 29 삼성스토어 원주 2층. It is situated at the 남원주IC 교차로, opposite 대성중, 고등학교 in the 삼성스토어 원주 2층.
What are the operating hours and repairable items at the 원주센터?

The operating hours are Monday and Friday from 09:00 to 11:00, Tuesday to Thursday from 12:00 to 14:00, and Saturday from 10:00 to 13:00. The center can repair items such as smartphones, tablets, wearable devices, laptops, PCs, monitors, printers, TVs, home theaters, audio equipment, DVDs, cameras, camcorders, ovens/microwaves, and other small appliances.
What are the parking and transportation details for the 원주센터?

The center has an estimated 160 free parking spaces next to the building. However, the parking area is very congested, so public transportation is recommended. The center is also accessible by taxi, located next to the 남원주IC 교차로 in the 삼성스토어 building on the 2nd floor.
